headline: Private vehicles offer flexibility; shared offers value
summary: Private vehicles provide schedule flexibility, photography positioning, and personalized guide attention. Shared vehicles save significant money (often 30-50%) and provide social interaction. For serious photographers or those with specific interests, private is worth the premium. For most first-time visitors, shared vehicles deliver excellent experiences at better value.

assumptions.text: Private vehicles typically cost 30-50% more than shared arrangements.
Private vehicles allow control over schedule, stops, and positioning.
Shared vehicle experiences are still excellent with good guides.

gains: Shared: Social interaction with fellow travelers
losses: Private: Solo travelers pay full vehicle cost

change_conditions: If serious about photography, private is strongly recommended.
If budget is primary concern, shared delivers great value.
If traveling as couple or group, private cost per person becomes more reasonable.
If specific wildlife interests exist, private allows focused time at sightings.
